Title: Gohin Baluchor
Writer: Badrul Anam Saud (story), Badrul Anam Saud (dialogue), Badrul Anam Saud (screenplay)
Actors: Suborna Mustafa, Runa Khan, Neelanjona Neela, Shahadat Hossain
Plot: Gohin Baluchor is a love story between a boy and a girl living in a village very near a river. One day a piece of land (Chor) rises from the water. This piece of land was once submerged in ...
